wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Pierce (born 19 February 1981) is a Welsh actor and musician who has appeared in various television series. In 2020, he began portraying the roles of Todd Grimshaw in the ITV soap Coronation Street and Gavin Moss in BBC Radio 4's The Archers. In 2006, Pierce was named in the Top 50 most eligible bachelors list by Company Magazine.
